Index.title: UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation
Index.subtitle: The governing body for MMA in the United Arab Emirates

slide1.title: UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation
slide1.description: The official governing body for Mixed Martial Arts in the United Arab Emirates, established in 2021 to develop and standardize MMA across the nation.

slide2.title: Upcoming MMA Championships

slide3.title: Join the UAEMMAF Community
slide3.description: Whether you're an athlete looking to compete or a club seeking affiliation, become part of the UAE's growing MMA community today.

about.title: The UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation
about.mission: Our mission is to develop and promote Mixed Martial Arts in the UAE, while ensuring the highest standards of safety, professionalism, and athletic excellence.
about.description1: The UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation (UAEMMAF) is the official regulatory authority for Mixed Martial Arts in the United Arab Emirates. Founded in 2021, the federation oversees the growth and advancement of MMA throughout the UAE, establishing consistent standards and promoting the sport at both grassroots and professional levels.
about.description2: On June 2, 2021, the UAEMMAF became a member of the International Mixed Martial Arts Federation (IMMAF), which has enabled the UAE to host flagship MMA and martial arts events. Registered in Abu Dhabi, the UAEMMAF aims to be the official regulator and provider of both amateur and professional MMA in the territory, responsible for its governance and technical development. The UAE MMA Federation also oversees the training and development of MMA athletes in the country, providing coaching and training programs for athletes at all levels.

article1.title: UAE National MMA Championship Concludes with Record Participation
article1.excerpt: The UAE National MMA Championship concluded with record participation, showcasing the country's growing talent pool in mixed martial arts. The event featured over 200 athletes competing across different weight classes.

article2.title: UAEMMAF Signs Partnership Agreement with IMMAF for Technical Development
article2.excerpt: The UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation has signed a strategic partnership agreement with the International Mixed Martial Arts Federation focused on technical development and referee training programs.

article3.title: Youth MMA Development Program Launched Across the UAE
article3.excerpt: A new Youth Development Program has been launched by the UAEMMAF aimed at discovering and nurturing young MMA talent across all emirates. The program will provide structured training and competitive opportunities.

article4.title: MMA Equipment Safety Standards Updated by UAEMMAF
article4.excerpt: The UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation has updated safety standards for all equipment used in official competitions, ensuring greater athlete protection through enhanced gear requirements.

article5.title: Women's MMA Fighters Excel at Regional Championships
article5.excerpt: Female MMA athletes from the UAE delivered outstanding performances at the recent regional championships, with multiple gold medal wins demonstrating the growth of women's MMA in the Emirates.

article6.title: Referee Training Program Graduates First Class of Officials
article6.excerpt: The first class of MMA referees has graduated from the UAEMMAF's specialized training program, adding 20 qualified officials to support the growing number of MMA events across the UAE.

article7.title: New MMA Regulations Effective Soon
article7.excerpt: The UAEMMAF has announced new regulatory framework for MMA competitions in the UAE, focusing on enhanced safety protocols and standardized rules across all emirates.

fullArticle.title: UAE National MMA Championship Concludes with Record Participation
fullArticle.excerpt: The UAE National MMA Championship concluded with record participation, showcasing the country's growing talent pool in mixed martial arts.
fullArticle.content:
The UAE National MMA Championship, held in Abu Dhabi last week, has concluded with unprecedented success, marking a significant milestone for the sport in the country. The event attracted over 200 athletes from across all seven emirates, competing in various weight classes and skill levels.

Organized by the UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation (UAEMMAF), the championship showcased the rapid development of MMA in the UAE since the federation's establishment in 2021. The tournament featured both male and female competitors, with particularly strong performances from the youth divisions, highlighting the effectiveness of grassroots development programs implemented over the past two years.

HH Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, who attended the final day of competition, expressed his satisfaction with the growth of the sport, stating: "The impressive level of talent displayed during this championship reflects the UAE's commitment to developing all sports, including mixed martial arts. We are proud to see Emirati athletes competing at such a high level."

The championship also served as a qualifier for the upcoming IMMAF World Championship, with the top performers earning spots on the national team that will represent the UAE on the global stage. The selected athletes will now enter an intensive training camp supervised by international coaches brought in by the UAEMMAF.

Beyond the competitive aspect, the event featured educational workshops on proper training techniques, injury prevention, and sports nutrition, aligning with the federation's holistic approach to athlete development.

As MMA continues to gain popularity in the UAE, the UAEMMAF has announced plans to increase the frequency of national competitions and expand training facilities across the country, ensuring that aspiring fighters have access to proper coaching and resources regardless of their location.
fullArticle.author: Ahmed Al Mansouri

aboutCapital.title: Capital Smart Financial Services
aboutCapital.mission: Our mission is to provide innovative financial solutions that empower businesses and individuals to achieve their financial goals with confidence and security.
aboutCapital.description1: Capital Smart Financial Services is a leading financial technology company based in the UAE. Established in 2023, we combine cutting-edge technology with financial expertise to deliver smart, efficient, and secure financial services to our clients.
aboutCapital.description2: With a strong focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, Capital Smart has quickly established itself as a trusted partner for businesses and individuals seeking modern financial solutions. Our team of experts brings decades of experience in finance, technology, and regulatory compliance.

aboutUs.title: The UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation
aboutUs.mission: Our mission is to develop and promote Mixed Martial Arts in the UAE, while ensuring the highest standards of safety, professionalism, and athletic excellence.
aboutUs.paragraph1: The UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation (UAEMMAF) is the governing body for MMA in the United Arab Emirates. Established in 2021, the federation is responsible for developing and promoting MMA in the UAE, as well as regulating and standardizing the sport across the country.
aboutUs.paragraph2: On June 2, 2021, the UAEMMAF became a member of the International Mixed Martial Arts Federation (IMMAF), which has enabled the UAE to host flagship MMA and martial arts events. Registered in Abu Dhabi, the UAEMMAF aims to be the official regulator and provider of both amateur and professional MMA in the territory.

vision.title: Building the Future of MMA
vision.description: The UAEMMAF envisions the UAE as a global hub for mixed martial arts, recognized for its world-class athletes, premier events, and innovative approach to sport development. We aim to establish a sustainable ecosystem that nurtures local talent while attracting international participation.

mission.title: Advancing MMA Excellence
mission.description: We are committed to creating a thriving MMA community in the UAE through comprehensive development programs, education initiatives, and high-standard competitions. Our approach focuses on both grassroots development and elite performance pathways.

values.0: Excellence in all aspects of sport management and athlete development
values.1: Integrity in governance, competitions, and relationships with stakeholders
values.2: Inclusivity that welcomes participation from all backgrounds and skill levels
values.3: Innovation in training methods, event production, and sport promotion

leadership.title: Board of Directors
leadership.description: The UAEMMAF is led by a dedicated team of sports administrators, former athletes, and industry experts committed to the development of mixed martial arts in the UAE.

presidentMessage.title: A Word From Our Chairman
presidentMessage.message1: The UAE Mixed Martial Arts Federation is committed to developing and nurturing the sport in the country. Abu Dhabi has established itself as a leading destination for hosting combat sports events, and we are proud to be part of these achievements.
presidentMessage.message2: The federation aims to provide world-class training opportunities and infrastructure for athletes of all categories, as well as nurturing local talent and preparing them to compete in prominent global forums. We also seek to host the most important and largest global championships in the UAE, attracting the strongest and most skilled athletes. We are determined to continue working to develop mixed martial arts in the UAE and around the world.
presidentMessage.name: H.E. Abdulmonem Al Hashemi
presidentMessage.position: Chairman of UAE Jiu-Jitsu and MMA Federation
